item.title: Python Descriptor Protocol Inside-out
item.description: Introduction What is Descriptor Descriptor Protocol Attribute Lookup Chain Applications Lazy Property define lazy_property class Descriptors in Python Internals Property Function & Method Class Method Static Method Reference Introduction Descriptor protocol is a important concept in Python, which is the basis of many Python internal implementation, such as properties, functions, class methods and static methods.
